title: Blended Learning Design to Enhance Effectiveness and Field Applicability of Mathematics Education

context.prior_knowledge: College-level foundational mathematics knowledge and practical application experience
context.additional_context: Short-term intensive course for practitioners conducted in a smartphone-centric, technology-limited environment

learning_goals: Learners design three or more problem-solving strategies to apply mathematical concepts to real-world work scenarios
Learners complete project deliverables incorporating peer feedback and revisions using mobile-based collaboration tools
Learners measure the applicability of learning outcomes in real-world settings using a self-assessment rubric and develop improvement plans

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
